languages.text: {n}Из щели напротив вашего лица вырывается поток пара, но Монтэг ловко прикрывает вас плечом. Спустя миг вы понимаете, что ничего не слышите... Точнее слышите лишь одно — рев мотора, торжествующий и полный силы.{/n} "Дикарь, похоже, согласен нас не убивать. Смотрящие за ним техножрецы будут довольны".

traits.locale_text: {n}Из щели напротив вашего лица вырывается поток пара, но Монтэг ловко прикрывает вас плечом. Спустя миг вы понимаете, что ничего не слышите... Точнее слышите лишь одно — рев мотора, торжествующий и полный силы.{/n} "Дикарь, похоже, согласен нас не убивать. Смотрящие за ним техножрецы будут этому рады".

languages.text: {n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Einrich deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you cannot hear a thing... Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."
languages.original_text: {n}Из щели напротив вашего лица вырывается поток пара, но Монтэг ловко прикрывает вас плечом. Спустя миг вы понимаете, что ничего не слышите... Точнее слышите лишь одно — рев мотора, торжествующий и полный силы.{/n} "Дикарь, похоже, согласен нас не убивать. Смотрящие за ним техножрецы будут довольны".

traits.locale_text: {n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Monteg deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you hear nothing... Or rather, you hear only one thing, a dragon's roar, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Savage has awoken and appears to agree not to kill us all."

{n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Monteg deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you hear nothing... Or rather, you hear only one thing, a dragon's roar, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Savage has awoken and appears to agree not to kill us all."

Or rather, you hear only one thing: a dragon's roar, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Savage has awoken and appears to have agreed not to kill us both."

Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."

Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."

languages.text: {n}Un torrente de vapor surge de la ranura frente a tu rostro, pero Einrich te cubre rápidamente con el hombro. Cuando te das cuenta, comprendes que no puedes oír nada... O, más bien, que solo puedes oír una cosa: el rugido del motor, triunfal y poderoso.{/n} «Parece que Salvaje ha decidido no matarnos. Sus tecnosacerdotes guardianes se alegrarán de saberlo».
languages.original_text: {n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Einrich deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you cannot hear a thing... Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un torrente de vapor surge de la ranura frente a tu rostro, pero Einrich te cubre rápidamente con el hombro. Cuando te das cuenta, comprendes que no puedes oír nada... O, más bien, que solo puedes oír una cosa: el rugido de un dragón, triunfal y poderoso.{/n} «Salvaje ha despertado y parece haber decidido no matarnos».

languages.text: {n}顔の前の裂け目から蒸気が噴き出すが、アインリッヒは巧みにあなたを肩で覆う。しばらくして、あなたは何も聞こえないことに気づく。というより、聞こえてくるのはただひとつ、エンジンの轟音のみで、勝ち誇ったような力強い音を上げていた。{/n}「どうやら、サベージは我々2人を殺さないと決めたようです。彼の技術司祭のガーディアンは喜ぶことでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Einrich deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you cannot hear a thing... Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}顔の前のスリットから湯気が噴き出すが、アインリッヒは巧みに肩で覆う。しばらくして、あなたは何も聞こえないことに気づく。というより、聞こえてくるのはただひとつ、勝利に満ちた力強いドラゴンの咆哮だけだった。{/n} 「サベージが目を覚まし、我々2人を殺さないと決めたようです」

languages.text: {n}一股蒸气从你面前的裂缝中喷了出来，但艾因里奇马上走到你身前，将你挡在了后面。过了一会儿，你意识到你什么都听不到了……或者更确切地说，你只能听到引擎的咆哮声，充满了力量与胜利的意味。{/n}“看来萨维奇同意饶过我们一命，那些技术神甫对这样的结果肯定很满意。”
languages.original_text: {n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Einrich deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you cannot hear a thing... Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}一股蒸气从你面前的裂缝中喷了出来，但艾因里奇马上走到你身前，将你挡在了后面。过了一会儿，你意识到你什么都听不到了……或者更确切地说，你只能听到一种声音：那种声音宛如恶龙的咆哮，充满了力量与胜利的意味。{/n}“萨维奇已经醒过来了。看来，它同意饶过我们一命。”

languages.text: {n}Eine Dampfwolke schießt aus dem Schlitz vor deinem Gesicht, aber Einrich gibt dir mit seiner Schulter geschickt Deckung. Einen Augenblick später erkennst du, dass du nichts hörst ... Nein, du hörst nur ein einziges Geräusch: Das triumphierende und mächtige Brüllen des Motors.{/n} "Offenbar hat Savage beschlossen, uns nicht zu töten. Seine Techpriester-Hüter werden erfreut sein."
languages.original_text: {n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Einrich deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you cannot hear a thing... Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Dampfwolke schießt aus dem Schlitz vor deinen Augen, aber Einrich gibt dir mit seiner Schulter geschickt Deckung. Einen Augenblick später erkennst du, dass du überhaupt nichts hörst ... oder besser, dass du nur eine einzige Sache hörst: Drachengebrüll, triumphierend und mächtig.{/n} "Wild ist erwacht und hat anscheinend beschlossen, uns nicht beide zu töten."

languages.text: {n}Un torrent de vapeur surgit de la fente située face à votre visage, mais Einrich vous fait barrage de son épaule. Un instant plus tard, vous vous apercevez que vous n'entendez plus rien... Rien si ce n'est le vrombissement triomphant du moteur à la puissance colossale.{/n} « Apparemment, Sauvage est d'accord pour ne pas nous tuer tous les deux. Ce sont ses gardiens technoprêtres qui vont être contents. »
languages.original_text: {n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Einrich deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you cannot hear a thing... Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un torrent de vapeur surgit de la fente située face à votre visage, mais Einrich vous fait barrage de son épaule. Un instant plus tard, vous vous apercevez que vous n'entendez plus rien... Rien si ce n'est le rugissement triomphant d'un dragon à la puissance colossale.{/n} « Sauvage s'est réveillé et semble d'accord pour ne pas nous tuer tous les deux. »

languages.text: {n}Yüzünün tam önündeki kesikten dışarı bir buhar seli taşıyor ama Einrich, seni omzuyla ustaca koruyor. Bir süre sonra hiçbir şey duyamadığını fark ediyorsun. Daha doğrusu tek bir şey duyabiliyorsun. Kulaklarına zafere ulaşmış, güçlü bir motor kükremesi geliyor.{/n} "Görünüşe göre Hoyrat, ikimizi birden öldürmemeyi kabul etmiş. Tekno Rahip muhafızları memnun kalacak."
languages.original_text: {n}A torrent of steam bursts from the slit in front of your face, but Einrich deftly covers you with his shoulder. A moment later, you realise that you cannot hear a thing... Or rather, you hear only one thing: the roar of the engine, triumphant and powerful.{/n} "Looks like Savage has agreed not to kill us both. His Tech-Priest guardians will be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzünün tam önündeki kesikten dışarı bir buhar seli taşıyor ama Einrich, seni omzuyla ustaca koruyor. Bir süre sonra hiçbir şey duyamadığını fark ediyorsun. Daha doğrusu tek bir şey duyabiliyorsun. Kulaklarına zafere ulaşmış, güçlü bir motor kükremesi geliyor.{/n} "Görünüşe göre Hoyrat, ikimizi birden öldürmemeyi kabul etmiş. Tekno Rahip muhafızları memnun kalacak."
